Bitcoin Price Slides Below $115,000 As Strategy And Metaplanet Buys Additional Bitcoin
summary:
Bitcoin Magazine

Bitcoin Price Slides Below $115,000 As Strategy And Metaplanet Buys Additional Bitcoin

Bitcoin price dropped below $115,000 as Metaplanet acquired 775 BTC for $93 million at $120,006 per coin, bringing its holdings to 18,888 BTC, while Strategy purchased 430 BTC for $51.4 million, increasing its total to 629,376 BTC.

This post Bitcoin Price Slides Below $115,000 As Strategy And Metaplanet Buys Additional Bitcoin first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Vivek Sen.
